title: Trump says CNN commentator Steve Cortes looks like a ‘WASP’ and asked if he likes Hispanics or America better
text:
‘Who do you like more, the country or the Hispanics?’

That’s the bizarre question President Trump asked Steve Cortes during a campaign rally in New Mexico on Monday night.

As Trump told the crowd, Cortes — a Trump 2020 advisory board member who has been a paid CNN commentator — just “happens to be Hispanic.” Although Trump apparently finds this hard to believe.

“He happens to be Hispanic,” he said, “but I’ve never quite figured it out, because he looks more like a WASP than I do.” Yes, the president likened his Latino supporter to the abbreviation for White Anglo-Saxon Protestant.

Trump added that nobody loves the country or the Hispanics more than Steve Cortes, before putting the man on the spot.

Cortes apparently answered question, and Trump continued, “He says the country. I don’t know… I may have to go for the Hispanics, to be honest.”

As some in the crowd booed or expressed disappointment, Trump added, “We got a lot of Hispanics.”
